name: Beware The Frog
description:
Beware The Frog is a game made for the annual 2022 Game Maker Italia, and it gained the third place.

The game is a platform where, other than jumping and wall jumping, you can use your tongue to reach distant places.



Try complete fully the game in 19+1 levels, or just go to the exit as fast as you can in speedrun mode!

Controls

  • Left and Right Arrow: Move Left or right;
  • Arrow up: Interact with signpost;
  • Z: Jump (press longer to jump higher);
  • X: Extract the tongue (press longer for a longer tongue);
  • R: Restart level (presso longer in challenge to restart the whole run);
  • ESC, P: Pause

The game is almost complete, it just need some polish here and there.
